properties.Name: Scope2Emissions
properties.Description:
Market-based method: A method to quantify the scope 2 GHG emissions of a reporter based on GHG emissions emitted by the generators from which the reporter contractually purchases electricity bundled with contractual instruments, or contractual instruments on their own.

Market-based: Where we have options in terms of energy product or supplier, these are the emissions associated with our procurement choices in the market.

Columns.Name: EmissionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: EmissionFactorId
Columns.Description: Unique identifier of a greenhouse gas type

Columns.Name: VirtualEmissionFactorId
Columns.Description: Unique identifier of a virtual emission factor

Columns.Name: PurchasedGasId
Columns.Description: Unique identifier of a purchased gas

Properties.Description:
Market-based method: A method to quantify the scope 2 GHG emissions of a reporter based on GHG emissions emitted by the generators from which the reporter contractually purchases electricity bundled with contractual instruments, or contractual instruments on their own.

Market-based: Where we have options in terms of energy product or supplier, these are the emissions associated with our procurement choices in the market.
